description: Once again, it`s return of Martial Arts Tea Ceremony master, Sentaro. The whole incident seems to be over some treasured tea set that rival schools have fought over for generations, and now it`s Sentaro`s turn to prove his worth!

titles.title: Battle for the Golden Tea Set!
Ougon no Chaki, Gojuunotou no Kessen
黄金の茶器, 五重塔の決戦
